connectModal.connectARepository:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the modal that prompts users to connect a GitHub repository.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connect to GitHub section → Connect a Repository modal (heading).
**When Users See This**: When attempting to connect Exercism to a GitHub repository.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Connect a Repository"
connectModal.ensureRepositoryReady:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains that users should have a GitHub repository ready before proceeding.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connect to GitHub section → Connect a Repository modal (paragraph text).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the Connect a Repository modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Before continuing, please ensure you have either created a new GitHub repository, or that you have an existing one ready to sync."
connectModal.connectGithubRepository:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to initiate the GitHub repository connection process.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connect to GitHub section → Connect a Repository modal (primary button).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the Connect a Repository modal and ready to connect.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Connect a GitHub repository"
connectModal.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to close the Connect a Repository modal without connecting.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connect to GitHub section → Connect a Repository modal (secondary button).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the Connect a Repository modal and deciding not to proceed.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Cancel"
